about_the_game:
ZAMOK is a first-person story game set in a dying dorm on the final night of its closure.

The game tells a surreal story intercutting between five students as they face the existential dread of a place once alive fading into nothingness, along with the memories and sensations of its inhabitants.

Although they live in the same space, the characters experience it in their own ways. As you explore the dorm and interact with its inhabitants, their fears and worries are mirrored in their surroundings. As the night goes on the environment and people within it shift in increasingly absurd ways.

You will have to explore the dorm, talk to its inhabitants and pay close attention to your environment in order to fully grasp the characters' relationships with each other and the dorm.

It’s better to go in blind and let yourself be surprised. The game takes about an hour to complete.

Content Warning: Flashing images.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong language and some of its themes revolve around alcohol and drug use. Player discretion is advised.
